jokes.Joke: The reason old man use Viagra is not that they are impotent. It's that old women are so very ugly.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: No matter how much you give a homeless person for tea... you never get that tea.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: When someone close to you dies, move seats.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: Boxers don't have sex before a fight, do you know why that is? They don't fancy each other.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: I'm not worried about the Third World War. That's the Third World's Problem.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: British scientists have demonstrated that cigarettes can harm your children. Fair enough. Use an ashtray!
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: Did you know you're ten times more likely to get mugged in London than New York city? Thats because you don't live in new york city
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: I'm not being condescending, I'm too busy thinking about far more important things you wouldn't understand.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: Throwing acid is wrong, in some people's eyes.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr

jokes.Joke: I worry about my nan. If she's alone and falls, does she make a noise? I'm joking, she's dead.
jokes.Creator: Jimmy Carr
